content: 1 d i s p l a c e d m o o s e d e s i g n s perfectly petite doorstop by elizabeth peat skills used us terminology chain single_crochet decreasing decrease increasing front loop only using markers rounds i wanted a small doorstop that i could hang up out of the way materials used when it wasn t needed it had to be quick to make and sturdy it turned out to be a great stash buster i always seem to have bag dk weight yarn on hand stylecraft life dk pattern 75% acrylic 25% wool 100g/298m/326yd shade 2338 taupe this pattern is worked in the round without joining between row the handle is worked as part of the bag with the free end slip stitched to the top 1 ball of the bag at the end as a result there are two ends to weave in the beginning and the end flower the dk weight yarn is held double throughout king cole big value double knitting bag 100% acrylic 100g/290m/320yd with two strands of yarn held together 2ch and work 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook use a marker to mark the first stitch of the next round shade 11 part ball round 1 working in the round without joining 2sc in each single_crochet 12 single_crochet notions round 2 2sc in first
